description: This is an ASP.NET Core API controller implementing authentication endpoints for user registration and login, utilizing dependency-injected services for user management and JWT token creation.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: Handles user registration and login API endpoints, providing JWT tokens upon successful authentication.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Handles registration of new users, returning a JWT token and user info if successful.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: Authenticates existing users and issues a JWT token.
